acceptance-test-run.title: When given an external factory, Podam should be able to create instances of XMLGregorianCalendar
acceptance-test-run.name: testXMLGregorianCalendarManufacturing

test-step.description: Given a Podam factory with XML Types external factory
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class javax.xml.datatype.XMLGregorianCalendar
Then the Object should not be null
